content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 11}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 60, "index": 24}, {"type": "creeper_head", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 43}]
thought: To craft mossy_stone_bricks, I need to place 1 stone_bricks and 1 vine in the crafting grid. I will first move the stone_bricks from slot 11 to slot 1.
act: move from slot 11 to slot 1 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 60, "index": 24}, {"type": "creeper_head", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 37}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 43}]
thought: Since the stone_bricks are already in the crafting grid, I now need to move the vine to the right of it. Slot 2 is to the right of slot 1, and therefore I will move the vine to slot 2.
act: move from slot 37 to slot 2 with quantity 1

TASK: Craft an item of type: mossy_stone_bricks
inventory=[{"type": "mossy_stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 0}, {"type": "stone_bricks", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "vine", "quantity": 1, "index": 2}, {"type": "soul_campfire", "quantity": 1, "index": 14}, {"type": "compass", "quantity": 10, "index": 23}, {"type": "blast_furnace", "quantity": 60, "index": 24}, {"type": "creeper_head", "quantity": 5, "index": 26}, {"type": "daylight_detector", "quantity": 60, "index": 33}, {"type": "purpur_slab", "quantity": 35, "index": 34}, {"type": "smoker", "quantity": 31, "index": 39}, {"type": "birch_planks", "quantity": 28, "index": 43}]
thought: Now I can craft the mossy_stone_bricks by moving it from the craft slot (0) to a free inventory slot (eg., 11).
act: move from slot 0 to slot 11 with quantity 1
